name: Solar Panel 250W
description: A high-efficiency 250W solar panel designed for residential and commercial use. Ideal for homeowners looking to reduce energy bills.

name: Solar Battery 5kWh
description: A reliable 5kWh solar battery to store excess energy for use during cloudy days or nighttime. Compatible with most solar panel systems.

name: Solar Inverter 3kW
description: A 3kW solar inverter that converts DC energy from solar panels into AC power. Designed for residential and small commercial systems.

name: Solar Panel 500W
description: A 500W high-efficiency solar panel perfect for larger systems, providing more energy for high-demand usage.

name: Portable Solar Generator
description: A portable solar generator to power small appliances on the go. Great for camping, outdoor activities, and emergency backup.
